build.buildCommand: echo 'Installing dependencies...' && YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false yarn install && echo 'Building shared package (prebuild only)...' && cd packages/shared && node prebuild.js && echo 'Created shared dist:' && ls -la dist && echo 'Building worker package...' && cd ../../packages/server/worker && echo 'Running worker build with permissive options...' && (tsc --skipLibCheck --allowJs --declaration false --noEmitOnError || echo 'TypeScript errors detected, using fallback build') && if [ ! -f 'dist/index.js' ]; then echo 'Creating babel config...' && echo '{"presets": ["@babel/preset-env", "@babel/preset-typescript"]}' > babel.config.json && echo 'Transpiling with babel as fallback' && yarn add --dev @babel/cli @babel/core @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-typescript && npx babel src --extensions '.ts,.js' --out-dir dist --copy-files && echo 'Babel build completed'; fi && echo 'Build completed - checking worker output:' && ls -la dist
